Title: The mostly ignored treatment for drinking too much
Description: People are using GLP-1s to cut back on alcohol use disorder, but there are already three FDA-approved drugs: naltrexone, acamprosate, and disulfiram.

Title: That ain't perfume! Ancient bottle contained feces, likely used for medicine
Description: Researchers found a tiny bottle from ancient Rome that contained fecal residue and traces of aromatics, offering evidence that poop was used medicinally more than two thousand years ago.

Title: How a recent shift in DNA sleuthing might help investigators in the Nancy Guthrie case
Description:
DNA science has helped solve criminal cases for decades.
But increasingly, investigative genetic genealogy — which was first used for cold cases — is helping to solve active cases as well.

Title: Epstein once attended an elite arts camp. Years later, he used it to find his victims
Description:
Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell lavished money on the Interlochen Center for the Arts to gain access, documents show — even funding an on-campus lodge they stayed in.
In the process, two teenagers were pulled into their orbit.
